00034 // Top level interface ---------------------------------------------------------
00035 class usb_device_handle : public boost::noncopyable {
00036 public:
00037   typedef boost::shared_ptr<usb_device_handle> sptr;
00038   virtual ~usb_device_handle() {}
00039   
00040   virtual std::string get_manufacturer() const = 0;
00041   virtual std::string get_product() const = 0;
00042   virtual std::string get_serial() const = 0;
00043   virtual boost::uint16_t get_vendor_id() const = 0;
00044   virtual boost::uint16_t get_product_id() const = 0;
00045   virtual boost::uint8_t get_num_configurations() const = 0;
00046   virtual boost::uint8_t get_bus_number() const = 0;
00047   virtual boost::uint8_t get_device_address() const = 0;
00048   virtual boost::uint8_t get_num_interfaces(boost::uint8_t) const = 0;
00049   virtual boost::uint8_t get_max_power(boost::uint8_t) const = 0;
00050   virtual const libusb_interface& get_interface(boost::uint8_t, boost::uint8_t) const = 0;
00051 
00052   static std::vector<usb_device_handle::sptr>  
00053   get_device_list(boost::uint16_t vid, boost::uint16_t pid);
00054 } ;

00081 class usb_control : public boost::noncopyable {
00082 public:
00083   typedef boost::shared_ptr<usb_control> sptr;
00084   virtual ~usb_control() {}
00085 
00086   static sptr make(usb_device_handle::sptr, int configuration=0);
00087 
00088   virtual void clear_halt(unsigned char) = 0;
00089   virtual ssize_t submit_control(boost::uint8_t  request_type,
00090                                  boost::uint8_t  request,
00091                                  boost::uint16_t value,
00092                                  boost::uint16_t index, 
00093                                  unsigned char*  buff,
00094                                  boost::uint16_t length,
00095                                  unsigned int  timeout=0) = 0;
00096 
00097   virtual ssize_t submit_bulk(boost::uint8_t  endpoint,
00098                               boost::uint8_t* data,
00099                               int             length,
00100                               int*            transferred,
00101                               unsigned int    timeout=0) = 0;
00102 } ;
